title: How to Perform an Impossible Card Trick

steps.headline: Shuffle the deck and have a sneak peek of the bottom card.
steps.description: Remember this card since you are going to "force" this card on your spectator.

steps.headline: Hold the deck face down and secretly move the bottom card a little bit to the left or right.
Take the card on top of the bottom card and place it on the floor.
steps.description: The spectator will think you're taking the bottom card. Bring back all the cards together.

steps.headline: Continue step 3 and say "Tell me when to stop".
steps.description: When he/she chooses to stop, show the spectator the bottom card (the card you remembered) and tell them to remember this card.

steps.headline: Shuffle the deck.
steps.description: Cut it. Give it to the spectator to shuffle and/or cut. When he/she hands you back the deck, look for their card. When you find their card, count 4 cards back, not including their card, and put the remaining cards on top of the deck. (for example, their card is the 7th from the bottom. Count 4 cards from it, you'll end up on the 3rd card. Place the 1st and 2nd cards on top of the deck.)

steps.headline: Show them the bottom card and ask them if that is their card.
steps.description: They will reply no and place it on the floor.

steps.headline: Continue the previous step until you have 3 cards on the floor.
steps.description: Form a square with the cards. Put the 1st card on the upper left corner, 2nd on the upper right and 3rd on the lower left.

steps.headline: Show them the 4th card and ask if that is their card, they will reply no, and secretly move the bottom card to the left or right and take the card on top of it, which is their chosen card, and place it on the lower right corner.
Cut/shuffle the deck so that they don't see the bottom card.
Ask them to choose 2 cards, instruct them to point only.
steps.description: If the chosen card is included in the cards they pointed at, take the other 2 and put it back in the deck otherwise take the 2 pointed cards and put it in the deck.

steps.headline: Finally, ask the spectator to choose between the two cards.
steps.description: If they point the chosen card, place the other card in the deck or if he/she choose the other card, put it in the deck.

steps.headline: Flip the remaining card (the chosen card) and wait for your applause,

text: Shuffle the deck and have a sneak peek of the bottom card. Remember this card since you are going to "force" this card on your spectator. Hold the deck face down and secretly move the bottom card a little bit to the left or right.  Take the card on top of the bottom card and place it on the floor. The spectator will think you're taking the bottom card. Bring back all the cards together. Continue step 3 and say "Tell me when to stop". When he/she chooses to stop, show the spectator the bottom card (the card you remembered) and tell them to remember this card. Shuffle the deck. Cut it. Give it to the spectator to shuffle and/or cut. When he/she hands you back the deck, look for their card. When you find their card, count 4 cards back, not including their card, and put the remaining cards on top of the deck. (for example, their card is the 7th from the bottom. Count 4 cards from it, you'll end up on the 3rd card. Place the 1st and 2nd cards on top of the deck.) Show them the bottom card and ask them if that is their card. They will reply no and place it on the floor. Continue the previous step until you have 3 cards on the floor. Form a square with the cards. Put the 1st card on the upper left corner, 2nd on the upper right and 3rd on the lower left. Show them the 4th card and ask if that is their card, they will reply no, and secretly move the bottom card to the left or right and take the card on top of it, which is their chosen card, and place it on the lower right corner.  Cut/shuffle the deck so that they don't see the bottom card.  Ask them to choose 2 cards, instruct them to point only. If the chosen card is included in the cards they pointed at, take the other 2 and put it back in the deck otherwise take the 2 pointed cards and put it in the deck. Finally, ask the spectator to choose between the two cards. If they point the chosen card, place the other card in the deck or if he/she choose the other card, put it in the deck. Flip the remaining card (the chosen card) and wait for your applause,
